description:
Ever had trouble with Dates and Times in Excel? Ever subtracted dates or times and ended up with gibberish? Ever wanted to learn how to calculate Date and/or Time differences once and for all? Well then....this course is for you!

After this course you'll never need to consult any other help file or tutorial. I'll give you the Big Easy on Date Time calculations. Whether its Dates, Times or DateTime Values, you'll feel confident in using Excel's built-in functions to manipulate them. And where Excel does not have "good" functions to help you, I'll teach you tricks simple-yet-powerful to get your desired result.

I assure you, this is your one stop junction for acquiring Mastery in Date and Time data types in Excel 2013.

So let's head!
title: Excel 2013: Master Date Time Calculations in 1 hour
